comment_0: I absolutely LOVE this song. Listening to Frank Sinatra makes me get high on life! How can you listen to a song like this and be sad????????? It makes me want to sing and dance!
comment_1: great song.  frank makes you love music.  no joke
comment_2: Gorgeous song!  I recently heard Robert Smith of the cure's version and love it even better! I was charmed how his voice suits jazz too!!!
